imdb.plot outline: Brigae 3 is centered on an ambulance brigade consisting of three people who dedicate themselves in saving people's lives. Toomas, an ex-surgeon who has lost his ability to work as a surgeon after a car-accident, is teamed up with a previous car-racer Anti and a nurse Ira. Besides the stressful everyday work, the trio has to deal with each other's tangled private lives and complicated life situations.
imdb.title: Brigaad 3
plot: The work and lives of an ambulance brigade.::Reet Grosberg

Brigae 3 is centered on an ambulance brigade consisting of three people who dedicate themselves in saving people's lives. Toomas, an ex-surgeon who has lost his ability to work as a surgeon after a car-accident, is teamed up with a previous car-racer Anti and a nurse Ira. Besides the stressful everyday work, the trio has to deal with each other's tangled private lives and complicated life situations.::Reet Grosberg
